title: Example Project Template
shortDescription: This is a template project to demonstrate the portfolio portal structure and capabilities.
longDescription:
This example project serves as a template to showcase how projects are displayed in the portfolio portal.

Key features of the portal include:
- Comprehensive project metadata tracking
- Status management (Concept, Development, Production)
- Technology and label categorization
- Built-in secrets scanning for security
- Rich project descriptions with media support
- Version tracking

You can use this as a reference when creating your own projects through the admin interface.
